thread.title: Football: Costa relishing chance to sink teeth against Arsenal
thread.title_full: Football: Costa relishing chance to sink teeth against Arsenal

title: Football: Costa relishing chance to sink teeth against Arsenal
text:
By Game Yetu Thursday, February 2nd 2017 at 11:41 [PHOTO: COURTESY] 
Arsenal have gunnered more points after 23 games than in eight of the previous 11 seasons, as per the Sun. 
They have been here before with Arsene Wenger and it is difficult to see whether any progress is being made going further. 
Those who witnessed the 2-1 home defeat to Watford will feel as though the team, at best, is standing still. 
A short time later, Wenger talked about his group not looking sufficiently sharp, that they were unfortunate and were not prepared for the physical difficulties of Watford, a team that had not won in their past seven Premier League games. 
More worryingly, if Arsenal were not prepared for the physical game, you can just ponder what will transpire when Diego Costa and Co hope to sink their teeth into the club on Saturday lunchtime in revenge for the 3-0 pounding at the Emirates. 
Wenger is running out of excuses. Again. ALSO READ: Wenger stumped after Watford sink Arsenal 
We are also presently moving towards the time when the Frenchman uncovers his future despite the fact that he will without a doubt acknowledge another £8million contract for the next two years. 
On their day, Arsenal's offensive may is magnificent. They have netted 82 goals this season in 34 games spread across 14 players – yet their defence remains extraordinarily frail.
